author: senh
title: Is there a doctor on board? Managing medical emergencies at 30,000 feet
text: BING NEWS: Running a Code in My Ice Skates, and Other Tales “Is there a doctor ... respond to medical emergencies in public at numerous times in my career. My family seems to think these medical emergencies happen all the time.
